alert.note: Alert for Northern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Piscataquis County through 530 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Tamway, or 17 miles south of Clayton Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chamberlain Lake, Tamway and Churchill Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for north central Maine.
